page.title: 08POLEGATE CLUBS & ACTIVITIES
page.content:
I GO TO THE 1st.POLEGATE BROWNIES IN THE CHURCH HALL. WE HAVE GROUPS CALLED SPRITES, GNOMES,PIXIES AND KELPIES. I AM IN THE SPRITES. WE MEET EACH WEEK ON A MONDAY. THERE ARE A LOT OF BROWNIE BADGES. I HAVE GOT THE HOUSE- ORDERLY AND CRAFTWORK. THE BADGES HAVE PICTURES ON THEM LIKE THE "CRAFT" HAS A SPIDER'S WEB. YOU GET A PROMISE BOOK IF YOU GET ENOUGH BADGES. WE ARE GOING TO CAMP SOON.
I GO TO SUNDAY SCHOOL. WE HAVE AN ASSEMBLY,SING SONGS,HAVE A PRAYER AND GO TO OUR CLASS. I AM IN CLASS 5. THE TEACHER READS US A BIBLE STORY AND WE HAVE TO ANSWER QUESTIONS. IN AUGUST EVERYONE GETS A BOOK,THE PERSON WITH THE BEST ATTENDANCE GETS THE BEST BOOK.THE STORY OF DANIEL IS MY FAVOURITE.DANIEL IS THROWN INTO THE LIONS DEN,HE PRAYS AND IS SAVED BY GOD
